entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
